summary: The meeting discussed the company's financial performance, strategic plans, and governance structure. The company reported a net revenue growth of 44.61% in 2020 compared to 2019. The meeting also approved the appointment of a new director and passed a resolution to appoint a director and place off an existing director.
key_points: Resolution to appoint director and place off existing director
action_items: Passing of resolution to appoint director and place off existing director
follow_up: Follow-up on appointment of new director
next_steps: The company will move forward with the appointment of the new director and will continue to focus on its strategic plans and governance structure.
